statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ 1 \\ 3 \\ 3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -1 \\ 0 \\ -4 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 2 \\ -5 \\ -6 \\ -18 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -4 \\ -9 \\ -13 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 6 \\ 13 \\ 24 \\ 44 \\ -11 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
